General.Name: Banco Hipotecario SA
General.Description: Banco Hipotecario S.A. provides wholesale and retail banking services in Argentina. The company offers savings, current, and investor accounts; personal loans comprising destination, housing extension, and salary plans; home, life, personal accident, ATM robbery, moving goods, protected purchase, and comprehensive business insurance products, as well as cell protection. It also provides investment products, such as fixed term deposits, mutual funds, titles and shares, mortgage bonds, safe boxes, and market data solutions, as well as financial advisory and debit and credit cards. In addition, the company offers treasury management, financing, accounts, and payment and collection solutions to corporates, institutions, and small and medium enterprises, as well as office banking services. Banco Hipotecario S.A. was founded in 1886 and is based in Buenos Aires, Argentina.
